channel.title: PayPal Donations
channel.description:
Well, I've been notified that a friend of mine has donated to my PayPal, possibly along with others, but my PayPal page says nobody has. I've received proof from them, but not a sign on my side says it happened. I've Googled and got nothing, checked my e-mails but had no luck, and even had my friend donate again (A very small amount of course), but still nothing showed up. It's been over 24 hours since the first donation, but much longer for those other hypothetical donations.
Could anyone explain the reasoning behind this? My account is unverified, but I have activated it. My friend's account is too, unverified, and he's been able to send and receive donations.
Thanks,
~Lin

item.title: PayPal Donations
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Did they send you echecks? Those can take a while

Your best bet is to contact paypal customer support. They are usually good for giving a quick response.

Read full topic
